rukus.text: sum tamane pana dhanki denari (kayamata) ni vata pahonci che
te divase ketalaya cahera apamanita hase
(ane) parisrama karanara thakela hase
te'o dhagadhagati agamam jase
atisaya ukalata jharananum pani te'one pivadavavamam avase
temana mate kantavala suka ghasa sivaya kami khannu nahim hoya
je na hrstaprsta karase ane na bhukha dura karase
ketalaya cahera te divase tajagibharya ane (khusahala) hase
potana prayatnothi khusa hase
uccasreni ni jannatamam hase
temam ko'i bakavasa nahi sambhale
temam eka vahetu jharanum hase
(ane) temam unca-unca asana hase
temam pyala mukela (hase)
ane eka kataramam lagela takiya hase
ane makhamali jajamo phelayeli hase
sum te'o untone nathi jo'i rahya ke te ka'i rite peda karavamam avya che
ane akasane ke ka'i rite uncu karavamam avyum che
ane parvato tarapha te ka'i rite khodi devamam avya che
ane dharati tarapha ke ka'i rite patharavamam avi che
Basa tame sikhamana apata raho. (Karanake) tame phakata sikhamana apanara cho
tame temana upara rakhevala nathi
ha! Je vyakti modhum pheravase ane inkara karase
tene allaha ta'ala bhare saja apase
cokkasapane amara tarapha ja temane pacha pharavanum che
pachi cokkasapane amara sire che, temano hisaba levo
